parameter.name: attribute
parameter.help: The name of the attribute whose value is animated. This attribute is required on an animator, unless the animator is inside an animatorgroup that specifies an attribute.

parameter.name: duration
parameter.help: The duration of the animation, in milliseconds (1000 = 1 second).

parameter.name: from
parameter.help: The start value for the animation. Defaults to the targeted attribute's current value.

parameter.name: indirect
parameter.help: The start value for the animation. Defaults to the targeted attribute's current value.

parameter.name: onstart
parameter.help: Sent when the animator starts. This event is sent multiple times if the animator repeats.

parameter.name: onstop
parameter.help: Event sent when the animator finishes.

parameter.name: paused
parameter.help: If true, the running animator will pause. If false it will resume.

parameter.name: process
parameter.help: "simultaneous" or none means process animators simultaneously "sequential" means process animators sequentially

parameter.name: relative
parameter.help: Whether the to value is relative to the initial value of the attribute (true), or is absolute (false).

parameter.name: repeat
parameter.help: The number of times to repeat the animation. This should be a positive integer, or 'Infinity'. Changes to the repeat value take effect, after the animation is finished and then restarted.

parameter.name: start
parameter.help: If true, the animator will call start.

parameter.name: to
parameter.help: The final value for the targeted attribute.
